snippet: Bank of America offered the U.S. the biggest settlement in history. | T-Mobile taunted Sprint after a takeover plan fell apart. | Why Walgreen shied away from an inversion in its deal for Alliance Boots. | Time Warner was silent on 21st Century...
abstract: Bank of America offered the U.S. the biggest settlement in history. | T-Mobile taunted Sprint after a takeover plan fell apart. | Why Walgreen shied away from an inversion in its deal for Alliance Boots. | Time Warner was silent on 21st Century Fox’s takeover attempt during its earnings call on Wednesday.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Bank of America's Big Mortgage Settlement
